name: Verify Course Setting to Ladagocia After Report Completion
description: Validates that Ladagocia becomes interactable after Cerebellum report completion and course can be set successfully.
testObjective: Ensure progression gate is removed and course setting mechanic functions correctly.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Interact with Ladagocia planet using [E] or [LMB]
steps.expected: System displays new prompt: '[X] SET COURSE [C]' (no longer blocking)
Course setting prompt closes/cancels without setting course
Course setting prompt reappears: '[X] SET COURSE [C]'
All screens fade to black, ship enters transit state
